objectives: Advanced ritual submission and validation features
Enhanced AI integration and machine learning

tasks.task: Implement real-time ritual validation with streaming AI responses
tasks.requirements: Create a streaming validation service that provides real-time feedback during ritual submission. Use WebSockets to stream AI validation results as the user types, with immediate feedback on ESEP and CEDA compliance.

tasks.task: Create advanced ritual analytics with machine learning insights
tasks.requirements: Implement machine learning analytics service that analyzes ritual patterns, cultural trends, and community engagement. Use clustering algorithms to identify ritual categories and sentiment analysis for cultural impact assessment.

tasks.task: Implement blockchain-based ritual verification and consensus
tasks.requirements: Create smart contract for ritual verification with community consensus mechanism. Include staking, voting, and reputation systems for ritual validation. Support multi-signature approval for cultural heritage council decisions.

tasks.task: Create advanced bioregion mapping and ecosystem integration
tasks.requirements: Implement advanced bioregion mapping with GIS integration, ecosystem data, and climate impact analysis. Include real-time environmental data feeds and ritual impact assessment on local ecosystems.

tasks.task: Implement advanced DAO governance with quadratic voting
tasks.requirements: Create quadratic voting system for DAO governance with vote delegation, proposal creation, and automated execution. Include reputation-based voting power and cultural heritage council elections.

tasks.task: Create ritual marketplace and economic incentives
tasks.requirements: Implement ritual marketplace with economic incentives, ritual tokenization, and community rewards. Include ritual trading, staking mechanisms, and cultural heritage preservation funding.

tasks.task: Implement advanced security with zero-knowledge proofs
tasks.requirements: Create zero-knowledge proof system for ritual privacy while maintaining validation. Allow users to prove ritual compliance without revealing sensitive cultural content. Include privacy-preserving analytics.
Implement AI-powered ritual recommendation engine based on user preferences, cultural background, and bioregion context. Include collaborative filtering and content-based recommendations.

tasks.task: Implement ritual collaboration and community features
tasks.requirements: Create collaboration features for ritual co-creation, community discussions, and cultural exchange. Include real-time collaboration tools, version control for rituals, and community moderation.

tasks.task: Create advanced ritual visualization and AR integration
tasks.requirements: Implement advanced ritual visualization with 3D models, AR integration, and immersive experiences. Include ritual space mapping, cultural artifact visualization, and interactive ritual guides.

tasks.task: Implement ritual impact tracking and sustainability metrics
tasks.requirements: Create comprehensive impact tracking system for ritual sustainability metrics. Include carbon footprint calculation, ecosystem impact assessment, and long-term sustainability reporting.

tasks.task: Create advanced ritual education and learning platform
tasks.requirements: Implement educational platform for ritual learning, cultural heritage preservation, and community knowledge sharing. Include interactive courses, cultural competency training, and certification programs.

tasks.task: Implement ritual cross-cultural exchange and translation
tasks.requirements: Create cross-cultural exchange platform with advanced translation, cultural context preservation, and intercultural dialogue tools. Include cultural sensitivity training and conflict resolution mechanisms.

tasks.task: Create ritual emergency response and crisis management
tasks.requirements: Implement emergency response system for ritual-related crises, cultural heritage threats, and community emergencies. Include rapid response protocols, community alerts, and crisis coordination tools.

tasks.task: Implement ritual legacy and cultural heritage preservation
tasks.requirements: Create comprehensive legacy preservation system for ritual documentation, cultural heritage archiving, and intergenerational knowledge transfer. Include digital preservation, oral history recording, and cultural memory banks.

milestones.name: Advanced Validation
milestones.description: Real-time streaming validation with immediate feedback

milestones.name: Advanced Analytics
milestones.description: Machine learning insights and pattern recognition

milestones.name: Blockchain Integration
milestones.description: Smart contract verification and consensus mechanisms
